channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 情報筋は、ハンターブルックの "ニュース・ヘッジファンド "計画と、その運営、証券取引法の遵守、信頼性の保持をめぐる疑問について詳述している（フィナンシャル・タイムズ）。
item.description:
Financial Times:
Sources detail Hunterbrook's plans for a “news hedge fund” and questions over its operations, complying with securities law, and retaining credibility  —  ‘Narrow needle to be threaded’ as start-up combines journalism with trading house  —  This summer, as investor Nathaniel Brooks Horwitz …

item.title: フィリピンのフェルディナンド・マルコスJr大統領は、自宅から放送中に銃撃されたジャーナリストのファン・ジュマロン氏の殺害を非難し、調査を命じた（Karen Lema/Reuters）
item.description:
Karen Lema / Reuters:
Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr condemns the killing of journalist Juan Jumalon, shot while broadcasting from his home, and orders an investigation  —  Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr on Sunday strongly condemned the killing of a Filipino journalist and ordered the police …

item.title: MrBeastの地元ノースカロライナ州グリーンヴィルの変化：スタジオ、高ストレスな新しい仕事、ランダムな花火、YouTubeコンテンツ制作の大学コース（Washington Post）
item.description:
Washington Post:
A look at changes in MrBeast's hometown of Greenville, NC: studios, high-stress new jobs, random pyrotechnics, and a college course on creating YouTube content  —  Jimmy ‘MrBeast’ Donaldson brought jobs to his North Carolina hometown.  Now locals are part of the show, whether they like it or not.

item.title: 記者が取材するスポーツで賭けを行うことができるかどうかについて、米国の12以上のニュースルームを対象に調査したところ、賭けを禁止しているところもあれば、正式なガイドラインを設けているところも少なく、無回答のところもあった。
item.description:
Sarah Scire / Nieman Lab:
A survey of 12+ US newsrooms on whether their journalists can bet on sports they cover: some ban the practice, few have formal guidelines, others didn't respond  —  Sports betting has exploded in popularity and is now online in more than half of U.S. states.  Yet few newsrooms said they addressed gambling in formal guidelines.

item.title: デジタルアイ：WGAとAMPTPの新契約で、2022年にパフォーマンス・ボーナスが発生するネットフリックスのオリジナル番組は5％未満（Lucas Shaw/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Lucas Shaw / Bloomberg:
Digital-i: fewer than 5% of Netflix's original programs in 2022 would have triggered performance bonuses under the new WGA-AMPTP contract  —  Using Hollywood's new metrics, less than 5% of streaming originals count as hit shows.  —  Let's kick things off with a fun data point.

item.title: 情報源：一部の衛星画像プロバイダーは、NYTが画像に基づくイスラエルの戦車配置を報じたことを受け、報道機関へのガザの画像提供を制限している（Max Tani/Semafor）
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
Sources: some satellite imagery providers are restricting imagery of Gaza to news orgs following a NYT report on Israeli tank positions based on the images  —  The Scoop  —  Key providers of satellite photographs to news organizations and other researchers have begun to restrict imagery …

item.title: パレスチナ人を支援する公開書簡がArtforumのEICデイヴィッド・ヴェラスコの解雇に至った経緯、抗議のために辞めたスタッフ、そしていまだ続く波紋（Nate Freeman/Vanity Fair）
item.description:
Nate Freeman / Vanity Fair:
How an open letter supporting Palestinians led to Artforum EIC David Velasco's firing, staff quitting in protest, and repercussions that are still playing out  —  The touchstone art publication's editor David Velasco decided, along with some members of his staff, to post an open letter …

item.title: AIと著作権で保護されたコンテンツに関する米著作権局の潜在的な規則に対する、メタ、グーグル、マイクロソフト、アドビ、アップルなどの企業の反応を見てみよう（Wes Davis/The Verge）
item.description:
Wes Davis / The Verge:
A look at companies' responses, including from Meta, Google, Microsoft, Adobe, and Apple, to potential US Copyright Office rules for AI and copyrighted content  —  The biggest companies in AI aren't interested in paying to use copyrighted material as training data, and here are their reasons why.

item.title: CNN、ラジオ番組でウルフ・ブリッツァーとジェイク・タッパーを「自己嫌悪のユダヤ人」と表現したフォックス・ニュースの司会者マーク・レビンを非難（Jeremy Barr/Washington Post）
item.description:
Jeremy Barr / Washington Post:
CNN blasts Fox News host Mark Levin for describing Wolf Blitzer and Jake Tapper as “self-hating Jews” on his radio show citing their Israel-Hamas war coverage  —  On his radio show, Levin also alleged that CNN journalists asking questions about the death toll in Gaza are ‘giving aid and comfort to the enemy’

item.title: ワシントン・ポスト紙の次期CEO、ウィル・ルイスのプロフィール。イギリス生まれの元記者で、テレグラフ紙のEICを務めた後、若い読者のためのニュース・ムーブメントを共同設立した。
item.description:
New York Times:
A profile of The Washington Post's next CEO, Will Lewis, a UK-born former reporter and former Telegraph EIC who co-founded The News Movement for young audiences  —  The former Dow Jones executive most recently co-founded The News Movement, a start-up aimed at young audiences.

item.title: ワシントン・ポスト紙、2024年1月2日付で元ウォール・ストリート・ジャーナル発行人で元ダウ・ジョーンズCEOのウィリアム・ルイス氏を新社長兼CEOに指名（ワシントン・ポスト紙）
item.description:
Washington Post:
The Washington Post names former Wall Street Journal publisher and former Dow Jones CEO William Lewis as its new publisher and CEO, effective January 2, 2024  —  The Washington Post announces William Lewis as its new Publisher and CEO.  Lewis will assume the role effective Jan. 2, 2024 …

item.title: SAG-AFTRA、AMPTPが「最後、最善、最後のオファー」と呼ぶ提案を検討中と発表、情報源：オファーには賃上げと「完全な」AI保護が含まれる（Deadline）
item.description:
Deadline:
SAG-AFTRA says it's reviewing a proposal the AMPTP calls its “last, best, and final offer”; source: the offer includes a wage increase and “full” AI protections  —  UPDATE, 3:14PM AFTER EXCLUSIVE: After meeting with studio CEOs earlier today, SAG-AFTRA has put out a statement …

item.title: ジョージ・フロイドの抗議活動中に地面に投げつけられ、固定され、逮捕されたLAist特派員のジョシー・ホアンが、LA郡と70万ドルの和解を成立させた（Frank Stoltze/LAist）
item.description:
Frank Stoltze / LAist:
LAist correspondent Josie Huang reaches a $700K settlement with LA County after she was thrown to the ground, pinned, and arrested during a George Floyd protest  —  Support your source for local news!  —  In these challenging times, the need for reliable local reporting has never been greater.

item.title: ジョナサン・メジャーの法的問題、番組や映画を通じた過剰なコンテンツ供給、VFXスタッフの過労など、マーベルの危機について（Tatiana Siegel/Variety）
item.description:
Tatiana Siegel / Variety:
A look at the crisis at Marvel, including Jonathan Majors' legal issues, its machine pumping out too much content via shows and movies, and overworked VFX staff  —  This past September, a group of Marvel creatives, including studio chief Kevin Feige, assembled in Palm Springs for the studio's annual retreat.

item.title: 10月28日に大英図書館が「サイバー事件」に見舞われた後、同図書館のウェブサイトはオフラインのままであり、学者はオンライン目録にアクセスできない（Alex Marshall/New York Times）。
item.description:
Alex Marshall / New York Times:
After the British Library was hit with a “cyber incident” on October 28, the library's website remains offline and scholars cannot access its online catalog  —  Libraries across Europe appear to be facing attacks from cybercriminals.  At Britain's national library, an “incident” is sending scholars back to an analog age.
